EmailTemplate.description: Reminder Alert on Post Task Due date for Non-Critical Tasks
EmailTemplate.name: CoreNT Task Notification Reminder 1 week post Task Due Date (Non-Critical)
EmailTemplate.subject: Task Due Past Reminder - {!CORE_NT_Task__c.ProjectId__c} : {!CORE_NT_Task__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Escalation Alert
Dear {!CORE_NT_Task__c.Assigned_To__c}, The task {!CORE_NT_Task__c.Name} assigned to you for {!CORE_NT_Task__c.ProjectId__c} project has reached its Due Date on {!CORE_NT_Task__c.Due_Date__c}. Please complete the task and the mark the Task as Completed.
Please login to Network Tracking for further details of the task.
